settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.description:
10 c Veggie or Bone Broth

1 c short grain riceGinger (1inch piece)

1 stalk lemongrass

5-8 garlic cloves

1/4 tsp turmeric

settings.heading: Instructions
settings.description:
In a large pot, sautee onions, ginger, lemongrass until the onions are translucent.

Add garlic.

Add rice and turmeric and sautee for a couple of minutes.

Top with broth, salt to taste, and bring to a boil with lid off.

Once boiling, lower temperature to medium and simmer for 30-40 minutes, occasionally stirring to prevent rice from sticking.

Using a whisk, stir porridge to break up rice and create a rich, starchy mixture.

Serve hot and add toppings like scallions, fried garlic, saffron, soft boiled eggs, shredded chicken.
